topic.title: Reason For Referral Section2 - conformance rules

section.p: This section describes the clinical reason why a provider is sending a patient to another provider for care. The reason for referral may become the reason for visit documented by the receiving provider.

ol.li:

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.1"

SHALL conform to Reason For Referral Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15427)/@code="42349-1" Reason for Referral (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15428, CONF:1098-30867)
